SyncPattern.Name: iTunes
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern places the tracks the same way iTunes places tracks in a managed iTunes music folder. Files are organized by Artist\Album\TrackNumber Name. This pattern is recommended for the Sony Ericsson W800i (Walkman phone).

SyncPattern.Name: Artist Folder
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes the tracks in folders named by Artist and album. Files are organized like this: Artist - Album\TrackNumber Name.

SyncPattern.Name: Flat
SyncPattern.Description: This pattern organizes all tracks in the root media folder of the device. All tracks from all artists are in one folder and names like this: Artist - Name.
